meanings.definition: To try hard to do or achieve something.
meanings.sent1: She endeavors to learn new skills every day.
meanings.sent2: He always endeavors to help his friends whenever they need it.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel endeavors to reach the acorn at the top of the tree.
meanings.sent4: Like a determined ant, she endeavors to carry the heavy load back to her nest.
meanings.sent5: With unwavering determination, he endeavors to climb the mountain despite the challenges.

meanings.definition: An attempt to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: His endeavors to start a small business were met with success.
meanings.sent2: The team's collective endeavors led to the completion of the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The cat's endeavor to catch the elusive red dot on the wall entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: Her endeavor to create a masterpiece out of recycled materials was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut's risky endeavor to explore the uncharted planet captured the world's attention.
